kata_component Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

A component for object oriented session handling using encrypted client-side cookies. keep in mind: this cookie is very big and is sent on EVERY request!

Author:
feldkamp@gameforge.de

A component for object oriented session handling using standard filesystem cookies

Author:
feldkamp@gameforge.de

locale-component. reads and caches an phpfile with language-strings components are lightweight supportclasses for controllers

The Locale-Component Class

sessions via memcache

A component for object oriented session handling using memcached needs PECL memcached-extension 2.1.2 or bigger
